original_text: You shall offer these besides the burnt offering of the morning, which is for a regular burnt offering.
korean_text: 아침의 번제 곧 상번제 외에 그것들을 드릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: You shall offer these besides the burnt offering of the morning
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 아침 번제 외에 이것들을 드려야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: which is for a regular burnt offering
